h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: There are a few strategies to try if you're having trouble here. Since trying to move while staff-spinning will just send you over the edge, you should instead try to use Cloud Step to evade their arrows and try to kill the archer on the platform quickly (he won't respawn) and then run from the Cyan Bat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
There are a few strategies to try if you're having trouble here. Since trying to move while staff-spinning will just send you over the edge, you should instead try to use Cloud Step to evade their arrows and try to kill the archer on the platform quickly (he won't respawn) and then run from the Cyan Bat.
